thread.title: Catching a Broadway Show? You Could be in For a Long Night

author: Charles Passy
title: Catching a Broadway Show? You Could be in For a Long Night
text:
Planning to see a Broadway show? Better wear comfortable clothing.
In an era when attention spans seem shorter than ever, a trio of hit shows—“Angels in America,” “The Iceman Cometh” and “Harry Potter and the Cursed Child”—now ask audiences to stay in their seats for several hours.
While the productions couldn’t be more different in their...
